(i think i paid ~$15 or so when i bought this when it was 0.12)

I bought the game the day .18 came out for $23 USD. I'm assuming your using USD, you may want to specify.

Edit: Now I feel like an idiot. Why would you be using USD in Hong Kong?
everyone buys things on the internet with usd (in some rare cases, euro) regardless where he's at. usually. isnt it the case?
$29.99 and it would still be a steal IMO
why this obsession with knowing what future customers are going to pay, how much of a discount you'll end up having had by the time KSP goes GA?
